page.title: 11A Scholar's Day In Edlington
page.content: My name is Nicola Clark.I attend Edlington Hill Top Middle School.I am 12yrs old.On June 19th I was awakened by my mum shouting in my ear.I got up at last about 08.15,falling over my slippers in my rush to find my games kit.I got dressed in my denim jeans, cotton jacket & trainers.I went to the bathroom,washed my face & cleaned my teeth.I then went down to have my breakfast of Sugar Puffs in the living room watching Breakfast T.V.At 08.45 I left to call for Moira and hurry to school in time for the whistle at 08.50.We have register then assembly, English until break then Maths;I am on Peak Book 6.In the yard I sometimes play Rallycoe.There are boys & girls teams.One team hides & the other has to find & take them to base.Prisoners can be released by a member of their team touching them & saying RALLYCOE.
